mapper.select: SELECT rp.id as id, rp.recomID as recomID, p.name as name, p.siteID as siteID FROM recomProblem as rp left join problem as p on rp.problemID = p.id

SELECT rp.id as id, rp.problemID as problemID, rp.recomID as recomID, p.name as name, p.siteID as siteID, up.regdate as date FROM recomProblem as rp left join problem as p on rp.problemID = p.id left join userProblem as up on up.problemID = p.id WHERE rp.recomID = ${recomID};
SELECT p.name as name, up.problemID as problemID, p.id as id, up.regdate as date FROM userProblem as up right join problem as p on up.problemID = p.id where up.userID= ${userID} and p.id = ${rpID}
